      • readExcelColumnFromStart

        public static java.util.ArrayList readExcelColumnFromStart(java.lang.String sheetName,
                                                           int coulumnNo)
                                                    throws jxl.read.biff.BiffException,
                                                           java.io.IOException,
                                                           java.lang.Exception
        Read excel(located at default location:"./testdata/webTestData.xls") column from start, until it finds the empty cell.
        Parameters:
        sheetName - the sheet name from which column data is to be extracted
        coulumnNo - the coulumn no. Index starts from 0 for Column A.
        Returns:
        the array list which contains data of entire column until empty cell is found
        Throws:
        jxl.read.biff.BiffException - the biff exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • readExcelColumnFromStart

        public static java.util.ArrayList readExcelColumnFromStart(java.lang.String fileNameWithPath,
                                                           java.lang.String sheetName,
                                                           int coulumnNo)
                                                    throws jxl.read.biff.BiffException,
                                                           java.io.IOException,
                                                           java.lang.Exception
        Read excel(located at custom location - fileNameWithPath passed as parameter) column from start, until it finds the empty cell.
        Parameters:
        fileNameWithPath - the file name with path. Ex:"./testdata/linkCheckerInputData.xls"
        sheetName - the sheet name from which column data is to be extracted
        coulumnNo - the coulumn no. Index starts from 0 for Column A.
        Returns:
        the array list which contains data of entire column until empty cell is found
        Throws:
        jxl.read.biff.BiffException - the biff exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
